Traits.Name: Hidden Nest
Traits.Description: At the start of combat, do not place Deadeyes on the map. When a Deadeye takes their first turn, they appear anywhere that is at least 4 spaces away from a hostile character and gain stealth.

Actions.Name: Marked For Death
Actions.Description: End turn and a creature in range 6 becomes marked. The deadeye boosts damage against the marked character.
